name: Dude! Hit The Egg!
description:
You are demonic entity willing to be reborn again. To bring this plan to fruition you possessed one of the dudes . You start from the very beginning, without anything. 

Bulk up on free protein

Eat small dudes

Avoid big dudes

Left mouse button for speed boost

Hit the egg when you are big enough

And destroy the world...

Ludum Dare 45. Theme: Start with Nothing. Compo submission.

Art: inkscape. Music: http://tones.wolfram.com generator. SFX: audacity
